docs.lead_paragraph: In the wake of several deaths related to Ecstasy, the Mad Decent Block Party this weekend will prohibit masks, pacifiers, dolls, eyedroppers, spray paint, unsealed tampons and other items.

headline.main: To Curb Drug Use, an Electronic Music Concert in Brooklyn Restricts What Guests Can Bring
headline.print_headline: After Deaths, More Items Prohibited at a Concert

docs.abstract: Organizers of Mad Decent Block Party, outdoor electronic dance music concert scheduled at Brooklyn's MCU Park, announce unusual set of safety measures; enhanced precautions, which include long list of prohibited items, were made after series of drug-related deaths at concerts across the country and Canada.
docs.snippet: In the wake of several deaths related to Ecstasy, the Mad Decent Block Party this weekend will prohibit masks, pacifiers, dolls, eyedroppers, spray paint, unsealed tampons and other items.

docs.lead_paragraph: West Africa's Ebola epidemic is an "extraordinary event" and now constitutes an international health risk, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Friday.

headline.main: WHO Declares Ebola Epidemic an International Health Emergency
headline.print_headline: WHO Declares Ebola Epidemic an International Health Emergency

docs.snippet: West Africa's Ebola epidemic is an "extraordinary event" and now constitutes an international health risk, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Friday.
